snippet: Iowa has long held a special place in the Obama creation story as the state whose caucuses propelled him on his way to the Democratic nomination in 2008.
abstract: Iowa has long held a special place in the Obama creation story as the state whose caucuses propelled him on his way to the Democratic nomination in 2008.

headline.main: Obama to Make Three-Day Campaign Swing Through Iowa
headline.print_headline: Pause in Hopscotching For an Iowa Bus Tour
